__e: Sir, I know there's no reason for me to be here, but I just...
Not because you feel the need for me to do it right here, right now, at this moment.
Wait, I don't need you to say another word because this is telling me everything that I need to know.
There's no need to come back all this way just for one day.
Thought you ain't need me to do nothing for you.
If that's the case then there's no need to do that.
I just don't feel the need to let you know I know what you don't know.
But I felt the need to speak up for this city that I love with all my heart.
Because I see in her something I once saw in you, the need to work for what's right.
Whatever he owes me, no need to repay.
I understand that every time you are in need, you come to me.
And the fact is, I occasionally have the exact same need you do.
Man's need to believe in the unbelievable.
When there is no death, no need to love, not to hate.
And you have more need of the money than me.
- There's no need for it to be anything else.
Okay, look, there's no need to make a big deal out of this, all right?
There's no need for you to go with him.
It has often been said that a friend in need is a friend, indeed, sir.
There's no point, it's like this every day.
It is their need and ours.
I too have the need and the right to know!
You know, I just see their need and I just want to act.
